I gave #p2012017# all the materials needed to continue his research. I thought he was nothing but a lunatic scientist, but... maybe not.
Hello, traveler. I wonder if you've ever experienced being attacked by a monster while traveling around the beach. Please know that #o4230201# in particular is very poisonous.

A few days ago, I requested #b#p2012017##k to create an antidote for #o4230201#, and he was more than willing to do so. With the antidote, I know I'll have a much better time in the water next time...

But in order to continue with the studies, he looks like he needs more materials to work with. Since this is for everyone visiting the beach...will you help him out? I understand that it's hard work, but you also go visit the beach every once in a while.

Ahhh, thank you so much. The items he need for the antidote studies are #b#t4000158##k and #b#t4000159##k, and I'd like #ba 100 each#k of those two. #p2012017# said that'll do. Now please go get them and deliver them to #p2012017...
You must be busy with something...come back later if you change your mind.
You! You seem to have #t4000158# and #t4000159#! Sell it to me now! I'm more than willing to meet your price... what? You're here through #p2060006##'s favor?

Ahahahah! Of course it's #p2060006##. For her to take care of this... I know I was saying all those things, but I've been in a rut because I couldn't find the necessary items for the experiment...you've helped me a great deal. Thank you!
Now I can really start working on my research. Making antidotes... that shouldn't take long. Me, #p2012017# the genius, will succeed!
